channel.title: Blog on Shreyas Mayya
channel.description: Recent content in Blog on Shreyas Mayya

item.title: Hello
item.description: Welcome to my blog! I’ll admit I’m not used to writing about my life, so instead of a recollection of some distant memory I’ll just make up a few questions and answer them. Why did you make a blog? I’vd been considering creating a blog for some time now. It seemed like a good way of sharing my thoughts while gaining the catharsis that comes with expressing myself. However, I’m also a painfully reserved person, and my fear of opening up kept me from making this site earlier.
